what: Branding for the Washington Soil Health Initiative
title: Branding for the Washington Soil Health Initiative
text: Inspired branding R packages glitr, ratlas, nmfspalette, washi provides color palettes themes consistent Washington Soil Health Initiative (WaSHI) branding.

title: Branding for the Washington Soil Health Initiative
text: can install development version washi GitHub :

title: Setup a color palette — palette_setup
text: Choose desired number colors whether colors reversed.

title: Setup a color palette — palette_setup
text: palette Character name palette palettes_washi. See names(palettes_washi) list available palettes. n Number colors palette. reverse Boolean indicating whether palette reversed. Default FALSE.

title: View a WaSHI palette — palette_view
text: palette Character name palette palettes_washi. See names(palettes_washi) list available palettes. n Number colors palette. reverse Boolean indicating whether palette reversed. Default FALSE.

title: WaSHI color palettes — palettes_washi
code: # List names of available palettes names(palettes_washi) #> [1] "standard"        "green_highlight" "red_highlight"   "gold_highlight"  #> [5] "green_gradient"  "blue_gradient"   "red_gradient"     # Get hex codes from a palette using dollar `$name` or # double bracket `[["name"]]` operators for extracting # list elements palettes_washi$standard #>     green      gray      blue       red      gold       tan     cream  #> "#023b2c" "#3e3d3d" "#335c67" "#a60f2d" "#fcb040" "#ccc29c" "#F2F0E6"  palettes_washi[["green_gradient"]] #>  [1] "#023B2C" "#1C4F40" "#376355" "#51776A" "#6C8B7E" "#879F93" "#A2B3A8" #>  [8] "#BCC7BC" "#D7DBD1" "#F2F0E6"  # Extract a color from the standard WaSHI palette palettes_washi[["standard"]][["green"]] #> [1] "#023b2c"
